title: Blackstone, Housing Stocks Slip as Trump Targets Big Investors
description: Shares of Blackstone Inc. and other housing-related companies tumbled Wednesday after President Donald Trump said he would move to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes.
content: Shares of Blackstone Inc. and other housing-related companies tumbled Wednesday after President Donald Trump said he would move to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes.
